graphicmotor.entities

Class EntitiesBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphicmotor.entities.EntitiesBank
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Entity>

    public class EntitiesBank
extends Object
implements Iterable<Entity>
    Each context have its own EntityBank.

    The EntitiesBank is mainly used by :

    • GooContext to save or delete entities into the context
    • MainGLEvent to iterate over the entities of the context
    This class use many list to register entity smartly and be more performing for other GMotor's components

    The index of an entity in the main list is represented with the id of this entity

    Author:
    goozi

    • Method Detail

      • iterator

        public Iterator<Entity> iterator()
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<Entity>

      • addEntities

        public int addEntities(Entity entity)
        Add the entity to the context's bank.

        This function search the lower free Id for this entity.

        If not such Id exist, it take the list.size() as Id

        The entity is now ready to be initialized with a GL context.

        Parameters:
        entity - entity to add
        Returns:
        the index in the main list of entity as an Id

      • removeEntities

        public void removeEntities(int entityId)
        Remove the entity.

        the Id is now free for other entities' creation.

        Parameters:
        entityId - id of the entity

      • get

        public Entity get(int entityId)
        Entity's assessor
        Parameters:
        entityId - id of the entity
        Returns:
        the entity at this index

      • initEntities

        public void initEntities(GL2 gl)
        Initialize any entity needed to be.

        For each entity ready to be initialized, it call the method Entity.init(GL2)

        After it clear the list of the entity to initialize

        Parameters:
        gl - valid GL context

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clear any entities.

        Now the EntitiesBank is empty and the next free Id is 0.
